name: generateRepresentations(for:update:)
desc: Generates various thumbnail representations for a file and calls the update handler for each thumbnail representation.
declaration:
func generateRepresentations(for request: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request, 
                      update updateHandler: ((QLThumbnailRepresentation?, QLThumbnailRepresentation.RepresentationType, Error?) -> Void)? = nil)
